nodes.text: The Thennqor system was a star system that was located within the Sarka sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was home to the sentient Thennqora species.
The Thennqor system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square Q-8.
